amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for Xerox Area Road Improvements, Monroe County, New York.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for Xerox Area Road Improvements, Monroe County, New York.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A032) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A032) Failed by voice vote.
